description: Sven Halek, after deep deliberation and discussion with a confidant, decides to release confidential files exposing Council sabotage and BCI corruption.

Sven coordinates the targeted leaks: reports about Council abuses, BCI sabotage, and pilot data fabrication quietly reach select journalists and activists. Council factions erupt into mutual accusations.

Widespread outrage erupts as the leaked evidence becomes public. Citizens and lower officials express shock at deliberate BCI failures and intentional erasures, sparking resignations and desertion among mid-level staff.
Mass demonstrations reignite as it is revealed that many residents’ erasures were political acts, not system errors. Calls for the dissolution of the Council and BCI abolition intensify.

With the Council paralyzed and ignored, neighborhood assemblies and resistance groups start coordinating essential services, openly challenging BCI-driven governance and ushering in a new era of decentralized city control.
